note.p: The argument specifies the password to access a KeePass credential store. Use of this argument is discouraged as it makes no sense to hide passwords, for example to access a database, by openly specifying the password to the credential store with job arguments. Instead, it is recommended to use the credential_store_key_file argument to specify a file that is owned by the JS7 Agent and that is accesible to the Agent only to access a credential store.
